assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Xpediator Plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides freight management services in the United Kingdom and the rest of Europe. It operates through three divisions: Freight Forwarding, Transport Support Services, and Logistics & Warehousing. The company offers freight forwarding services by road, ocean, sea, and air; 3PL services, warehousing, pick and pack services, e-commerce solutions, and distribution and return management services; and custom clearance services for import and export shipments. It also operates a network of Pall-Ex, a palletised freight express transport service, which uses a network of regional and central hubs to move goods with overnight load transport. In addition, the company offers groupage, a freight forwarding service; and end-to-end supply chain solutions comprising inbound logistics, storage, and related services, as well as final mile delivery. Further, it is involved in e-commerce fulfillment; domestic express palletised freight distribution; and collection of full and part-loads within national markets, as well as provision of cross-border online delivery, and fashion logistics and related services. Additionally, it sells credit cards for payment of fuel, tolls, and related services; and provides ferry crossing booking services, broker service for funders and leasing entities, and GPS solutions under the Affinity brand name. It serves technology, manufacturing, FMCG, automotive, agriculture, retail, and e-commerce. The company was formerly known as Xpediator Services PLC and changed its name to Xpediator Plc in December 2016. Xpediator Plc was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Braintree, the United Kingdom.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Luke  Croome
companyOfficers.title: COO of Fashion & Retail Division and Member of Operating Board
